definitions: a bag or basket on wheels for carrying shopping purchases, in particular one on wheels provided for the use of supermarket customers.

examples.text: pedestrians milled about with grocery bags and shopping carts

definitions: a facility on a website that records items selected by a customer for purchase until the transaction is completed

examples.text: much to her dismay, when she got back to the computer to resume shopping, her shopping cart was empty

shortDefinitions: facility on website that records items selected for purchase
